text:
Oh awesome news! You are clearly smashing these interviews. Well done. Yeah weekends only sounds tricky to manage with paying bills. What is the position with Rodeo?

Anders said he sent my recommendation to the relevant London Goodbye Kansas people, so hopefully you will hear some positive news from them soon as well!

:relaxed: I think I have good communication skills. The position would be Render Wrangler, same as Framestore, but I wonâ€™t be much with the team as I would only go on weekends.. 
Thank you so much for that! I will let you know when I hear back from them :)
